name: reactai
description: ReactAI - AI-powered React components for building intelligent applications
author: reachbrt

scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:demo
scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace @reactai/core && npm run build --workspace @reactai/chatbot && npm run build --workspace @reactai/autosuggest && npm run build --workspace @reactai/smartform && npm run build --workspace @reactai/analytics
scripts.publish:packages: npm run build:packages && npm publish --access public --workspaces --workspace packages
